entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
